row.entry: The sensors of some cameras like the Fujifilm FinePix S2Pro, F700, and E550 have a diagonally oriented Bayer pattern instead of the usual orthogonal layout. Without correction this would lead to a tilted image with black corners. This module applies the needed rotation.

sect4.title: Usage
sect4.para: darktable detects images that need correction by their Exif data and automatically activates this module. For other images the module always remains disabled. The modules has no parameters.
